parsedContentPreview: {"id":"egy_lesson_05_verbs_basics","title":{"arabic":"الأفعال في المصري: الماضي والحاضر والمستقبل","english":"Egyptian Verbs: Past, Present, and Future","transliteration":"El-af3al fel Masry: El-madi wel-hader wel-mosta2bal"},"level":"beginner","description":{"english":"A comprehensive guide to mastering verb conjugations in Egyptian Arabic. This lesson covers the present, past, and future tenses for common verbs, focusing on how to change the verb based on who is speaking.","arabic":"دليل شامل لإتقان تصريف الأفعال في اللهجة المصرية. الدرس ده بيغطي المضارع والماضي والمستقبل لأفعال شائعة."},"learningObjectives":["Conjugate regular verbs in the Present Tense with the 'bi-' prefix","Conjugate regular verbs in the Past Tense using suffixes","Form the Future Tense using the 'ha-' prefix","Understand subject pronouns in Egyptian Arabic","Use negation with verbs in different tenses"],"estimatedDuration":60,"prerequisites":["Basic reading skills","Introduction to pronouns"],"subLessons":[{"id":"sub_01_pronouns_present_singular","title":{"arabic":"المضارع (المفرد)","english":"The Present Tense (Singular)","transliteration":"El-Modare3 (El-mofrad)"},"content":{"title":{"arabic":"أنا بشرب، هو بيشرب","english":"I drink, He drinks","transliteration":"Ana bashrab, howa biyishrab"},"phrases":[{"arabic":"أنا بشرب","english":"I am drinking / I drink","transliteration":"Ana bashrab"},{"arabic":"إنتَ بتشرب","english":"You (male) are drinking","transliteration":"Enta bitishrab"},{"arabic":"إنتي بتشربي","english":"You (female) are drinking","transliteration":"Enti bitishrabi"},{"arabic":"هو بيشرب","english":"He is drinking","transliteration":"Howa biyishrab"},{"arabic":"هي بتشرب","english":"She is drinking","transliteration":"Heya bitishrab"},{"arabic":"مية","english":"Water","transliteration":"Mayya"},{"arabic":"قهوة","english":"Coffee","transliteration":"Ahwa"}],"explanations":[{"english":"In Egyptian Arabic, the Present Continuous/Habitual tense usually adds a 'b' sound to the beginn
